name: Cutting Edge Farming
description:
Stay alive and catch as many discs as you can in this hectic arcade game.

Catch  discs to get points and weapons. Kill enemies to spawn more discs. Repeat.

Rules:

Active discs create enemies when they hit walls

More active discs catch at once = more points and better weapon.

Kill enemies create inactive discs. walk over them to catch them before they activate and get bonus points.
